lead_paragraph: SLOAN--Howard. The Board and staff of Lincoln Center Theater are deeply saddened by the death of our longtime Board member, Howard Sloan. He was an intelligent, charming, funny man, and he truly loved the Theater. We send our condolences to his wife Barbara and to his entire family. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
